noResults.title: No Results Yet
noResults.description: Complete at least one test to see your results here.

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.allNormal: All your test results appear normal. Continue regular eye health monitoring.
recommendations.seeDoctor: Based on your results, we recommend consulting an eye care professional.
recommendations.followUp: Some results may warrant professional evaluation.

history.title: Test History
history.improved: Your visual acuity improved from {{from}} to {{to}}
history.stable: Your visual acuity has remained stable at {{value}}
history.changed: Your visual acuity changed from {{from}} to {{to}}

colorPerfect.title: Color Master
colorPerfect.description: Perfect score on color vision test

comparison.improved: Your {{test}} has improved since last time
comparison.declined: Your {{test}} may have changed - consider retesting

findDoctor.title: Find Eye Doctors Near You
findDoctor.description: We'll use your location to show nearby eye care professionals on Google Maps.
findDoctor.privacyText: Your location is used once to open Google Maps and is never stored or sent to our servers.
